valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 5 Jan 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Tue 6 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low Viking 1007 expected Fisher 1007 by 0600 tomorrow. New low Faeroes 1004 expected by same time. Lows Plymouth 1010 and German Bight 1003 both losing their identities
